comments.body: I would suggest re-ordering this troubleshooting guide to direct new users first to Stackoverflow for troubleshooting help, and only after they have exhausted that option, consider filing bug reports or feature requests.  From my experience things that look like bugs or missing features to new users often evaporate once more experienced users offer alternative approaches or configuration debugging support.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +59,63 @@# Help! My question isn't covered!  I need help now!

## Stackoverflow

Someone else from the community may have already asked a similar question or may be able to help with your problem. The Kubernetes team will also monitor posts tagged kubernetes.
